book.synopsis: Mark Twain is best known as one of this country"s finest humorists and novelists. As this collection confirms, he was one of our finest essayists as well. Gathered here in a single volume, these pieces reveal the complete range of this esteemed American writer and contain some of his best, funniest, and most caustic work.
book.title_long: The Complete Essays Of Mark Twain
